info.name: Youtube 2010 Player
info.description: A modified HTML player that is closer to the one present in 2010. There are also edits to the page layout to more closely resemble older youtube layouts.
info.additionalInfo:
-Light(white) video player
-Red/Green dislike bar
-Guide is hidden by default
-Channel pages have larger left/right margins
-Edits to the navigation bar

data.title: This is really good! Thanks for the upload! :D
